column5: Simple, clean home for out of town business travelers that need a private room with bathroom to rest. Access to Living Room, Kitchen, Backyard with pool will make your stay most enjoyable. Owner is single with large 4 bedroom home. The home is 3 miles from the Shops of Legacy in the heart of Plano and 30 minutes from DFW Airport. Also 10 minutes from the Frisco Roughriders Ball Park and Dr. Peppers stadium.
